name: BSCBETS
description: Bsc Bets - the top platform for football and crypto lovers inspired by World Cup 2022 that will bring you the newest experience in football prediction. Features include match prediction, WC winner prediction, Jackpot, WCI DAO Pool. Applying Blockchain technology and building on the Web 3.0 platform makes BSCBETS DAPP user-friendly. Users only need to connect their decentralized wallet to be able to get access to all the features and programs available on BSCBETS DAPP.
